topic.title: MAW GWT: Flow Model Aquifer Properties

para.text: MAW GWT: Flow Model Aquifer Properties
In the "Data|Edit Data Sets" dialog box, set the default formula for Kx to 10.

image.title: Screen capture of the Data Sets dialog box showing the default formula for the Kx data set.
image.caption: Screen capture of the Data Sets dialog box showing the default formula for the Kx data set.
